description_cleaned: rubius is an accredited it company. we develop software for clients from various industries from industrial and oil amp gas to retail and medicine. founded in the very heart of siberia tomsk we now have partner companies all over the world. our solutions are used by russian and global leaders such as apple tesla kaspersky amazon ibm uber netflix gazprom russian railways and others. the company partners are located in the uae dubai kazakhstan astana russia moscow st. petersburg and saudi arabia riyadh job description contract for one year we are looking for hands_on data scientist to lead the development of machine learning models and data_driven insights for digital oilfield dof systems. this role requires strong foundation in data science and statistical modeling with the ability to transform noisy real_world oilfield data into actionable intelligence for engineering teams. business trips to kuwait for month or two are obligatory if you want to live there for year contact period you are also welcome candidate will work alongside production engineers software developers and ml engineers to design validate and operationalize predictive and prescriptive analytics that support key decisions in subsurface and surface operations. oil amp gas experience is strong asset but not mandatory the ideal candidate brings analytical rigor and problem_solving expertise to solve complex field challenges. key responsibilities analyze diverse operational datasets time series tabular sensor logs etc. to extract insights and guide model development. build and evaluate ml models for forecasting anomaly detection pattern recognition and classification. work with engineers to define kpis and convert domain_specific questions into quantifiable modeling tasks. design meaningful visualizations and dashboards to communicate model outputs clearly. collaborate with ml ops and software teams to deploy models into production environments and monitor performance. required skills and experience strong statistical background and data science expertise with real_world datasets. proficient in python numpy pandas scikit_learn xgboost etc. sql fluency and data wrangling skills. experience working with large messy or multivariate time series data. ability to communicate complex model behavior to engineers and stakeholders. comfortable working in cross_functional teams with domain and technical experts. nice to have oilfield data exposure e.g. well data reservoir simulations production logs or interest in industrial applications. familiarity with dof systems or production optimization frameworks. exposure to llms nlp techniques or agent_based ai for enhancing technical workflows. cloud familiarity azure preferred knowledge of ml platforms e.g. azure ml databricks certifications azure data scientist associate or microsoft ai fundamentals certification is plus. aws cloud knowledge is welcome but not required. industry experience experience in the oil and gas industry will be significant plus. candidates with experience in building ai systems in other industries are also encouraged to apply. what we offer our employees are the main asset of rubius. we support creative freedom and the soar of engineering thought. we strive to ensure that every member of our team realizes their potential. we care about our employees. here both remote and in_office teams feel maximally comfortable. about work and compensation official employment and timely quot white quot salary fully legal amp transparent monthly performance bonus of up to comfortable workspace with an ergonomic chair support with home office setup for remote employees flexible start to the working day bonuses for being part of an accredited it company business trip expenses on us about growth and development individual development track work with tech lead and mentor we have technical guilds opportunity to join the company technical council compensation for professional certification within individual tracks internal meetups on various topics and detailed guides about the office perks and atmosphere paid sports activities even for home workouts opportunity to get private health insurance including dental after the probation period for office employees and telemedicine for remote employees tasty breakfasts an office with veranda and large kitchen discounts for you and your relatives at rubius academy bonuses for the birth of children and marriage diverse corporate events and activities developed and comfortable corporate culture without hierarchy interest_based communities soccer tennis our own music band chess club... and team where everyone opinion is heard. to get to know us better search for quot rubius quot in your browsers. we will be happy to work in team with people who love what they do please note that the employment contract will be for fixed term of one year.

информационные потоки обеспечивая высокую точность полноту актуальность контента продукте. наша работа напрямую влияет качество сервиса лояльность пользователей. разрабатываем алгоритмические ml_решения автоматизации задач применяя весь спектр инструментов nlp стека расстояния левенштейна линейных моделей коммерческих llm локальных аналогов. расширяем команду ищем nlp_инженера которому интересно работать большими сложными наборами данных развивать ml_решения структурируя приводя порядок. какие задачи решаем добыча данных умные системы поиска товаров контактов описаний других данных связанных компаниями. поддержка актуальности информации компаниях помощью данных моделей проводим валидацию существующей информации компаниях добываем новую. категоризация товаров автоматическая классификация товаров основе описаний характеристик. модерация данных предотвращаем публикацию нежелательных отзывов товаров продукте. наши ожидания кандидата опыт работы nlp_задачами лет. уверенное владение pytorch hf transformers основными библиотеками обработки текста ml dl. глубокое понимание llm архитектуры моделей файнтюнинга техник улучшения качества генерации. опыт применения llm стека низкоуровневых решений vllm sglang инструментов оркустрации интеграции langchain llamaindex. навыки применения классических глубоких llm моделей. уверенные навыки разработки python владение git. готовность работать этапах разработки анализа проблемы проведения экспериментов оценки решений реализации виде сервисов. крутым бонусом опыт работы ci cd инфраструктурой docker gitlab kubernetes kafka fastapi grpc. глубокое знание python multiprocessing asyncio. навыки интеграции деплоя ml_моделей продуктовые серверные приложения. навыки оптимизации инференса ml dl_моделей distillation pruning ort triton. почему стоит нам присоединиться сложные задачи реальном продукте сотни тысяч организаций горы связанных ними данных разной степени структурированности. свобода выбирать технологии используем классические алгоритмы передовые ml решения. влияние продукт разрабатываемые нами решения улучшают пользовательский опыт продуктах компании. сильная команда которой расти умножать свои знания принося общий вклад. фокус исследования первую очередь занимаемся поиском оптимальных подходов качеству производительности. почему классно 2гис аккредитованная it_компания. работать удалённо. важен специалист локация. хочешь работать гибридном формате офисы москве санкт_петербурге классных офиса новосибирске. также коворкинги нижнем новгороде томске астане алма_ате. само собой полностью белая зарплата. заботимся здоровье дмс возможность получать онлайн_консультации терапевта невролога психолога медицинского агента. хочешь делиться своим опытом поможем выступлениями конференциях статьями хабра vc. собственный учебный центр курсы тренинги книги прокачки скиллов.

description_cleaned: location uae dubai type full_time office_based role in dubai industry family office about us we are an international trading and research team with deep expertise in systematic trading across u.s. equities nyse nasdaq global futures cme eurex and options. our mission is to design test and deploy innovative algorithmic strategies using data science machine learning and artificial intelligence. we are now looking for data scientist with strong quantitative and ai background to join our team. key responsibilities research design and implement machine learning algorithms classification regression deep learning for trading signal generation. apply time series modeling feature engineering anomaly detection and clustering to market data. conduct backtesting walk_forward validation and monte carlo simulations for strategy robustness. explore reinforcement learning rl methods ppo dqn a3c for adaptive trading strategies. leverage llms chatgpt claude grok etc. for research automation and fast prototyping. collaborate with quant researchers and algo traders to integrate models into python_based frameworks. requirements strong programming skills in python with data science and ml libraries numpy pandas scikit_learn pytorch tensorflow solid knowledge of machine learning methods supervised amp unsupervised learning feature selection dimensionality reduction. experience with time series forecasting and financial market data. ability to work independently. preferred qualifications understanding of backtesting frameworks and risk_adjusted tutoring features and learning games. we re the biggest english tutoring platform for kids in europe delivering millions of lessons each year. we re looking for product manager to explore and implement customer retention strategies minimise churn and focus on perfecting the after_purchase user journey. you ll have cross_functional squad of developers designers and analysts and access to leverage our product portfolio including live tutoring ai tutoring and learning games to test and validate hypotheses around how best to convey the value of novakid to existing customers. what you ll do develop and implement strategies to drive long_term user retention. analyse user behavior and segmentation to identify high_risk churn cohorts and take action to re_engage them. proactively monitor churn metrics and identify root causes. work with the customer support data and product teams to address pain points and develop retention_focused product improvements. own the entire post_purchase user journey. ensure customers continue to derive value from our products after their initial purchase and maintain high level of satisfaction. collaborate with marketing customer success and design teams to create personalised targeted campaigns that nurture users and build loyalty. leverage data analytics testing and customer insights to make informed decisions. use metrics to measure success and continuously optimise user journeys to improve ltv. work closely with design engineering marketing and customer success teams to create test and launch new initiatives that improve the customer experience and reduce churn. build and refine customer segments to enable personalised post_purchase experiences. use these insights to target different user groups with tailored messaging and retention tactics. what you ll have years of product management experience with strong focus on user retention customer experience or post_purchase journeys. proven experience in using data and analytics to drive product decisions and optimisations. excellent understanding of customer behavior and lifecycle management. cross_functional collaboration experience and the ability to influence organized detail_oriented professional who thrives in dynamic content_driven environments novakid learning content team is looking for project manager to ensure our workflows are smooth our timelines on track and our esl learning materials delivered to the highest standard. this role isn just about coordination it about helping the team understand and act on key metrics that drive our success. you ll play crucial role in monitoring and interpreting data such as experiment success metrics learning content efficacy and trial_to-purchase conversion etc. ensuring our decisions are informed measurable and aligned with business goals. responsibilities you won be creating the content but you will be the operational backbone of the team. you ll oversee project timelines manage jira boards facilitate collaboration across teams and ensure quality assurance qa and quality control qc processes are followed consistently. you ll also work closely with team leads and cross_functional partners including data and analytics teams to track report and interpret key performance metrics helping identify what working where improvements are needed and how content performance links to learner outcomes and conversion success. you ll turn insights into actionable strategies that enhance the effectiveness and impact of our learning content ensuring that metric_driven decisions guide how we innovate prioritize and deliver engaging learning experiences. you re comfortable asking questions of data spotting trends and connecting insights to the learner experience helping the team continuously grow through curiosity and evidence_based decisions. we re seeking someone who can english language proficiency level c1 quickly learn and understand complex workflows pay close attention familiarity with project management tools and cross_functional team coordination you are proactive calm under pressure detail_oriented and an excellent communicator conditions remote work. we are very description_cleaned: the demurrage department is responsible for adding value to oil trading activities by providing expertise associated with voyage_chartered tonnage contracts of affreightment and oil contracts for both the vessel and barge markets. the demurrage team evaluates and negotiates demurrage claims with 3rd parties in line with oil and shipping contracts to ensure the optimal commercial outcome for company. these claims are associated with voyages from wide range of geographies. the demurrage negotiator is responsible for managing portfolio of demurrage claims on behalf of one or more trading benches. this involves analyzing negotiation invoicing and payment handling of demurrage claims resulting from contracts with owners oil majors and trading companies. working in close co_operation with the trading community to provide analytical information and guidance to the trading benches in order to reduce the risk of demurrage exposure and optimize demurrage prevention to ultimately maximize trading profits. key accountabilities you will ultimately be responsible for the following managing your own portfolio of claims both payable and receivable on behalf of your trading benches calculation preparation verification and negotiation of demurrage claims and invoices in accordance with oil trading contracts general terms and conditions charterparty terms while being aware of the legal environment and industry custom and practice ensuring strict adherence to various contractual charter party time bar clauses minimizing company commercial loss investigation and collation of the facts and data gathered from traders operators and charterers in order to fully assess each individual demurrage claim developing and maintaining strong constructive and respectful relationships with 3rd parties including trading companies ship owners and brokers upon agreement issuing and settlement of invoices through company accounting systems. assign costs to appropriate benches to ensure accurate profits and losses are reflected collaborating with settlement analysts and commodity risk to ensure this is done in correct and timely manner provide detailed analytical assessments on regular basis of outstanding claims costs exposure to trading benches and trade control maintain open lines of communication and frequent interaction with the operators and traders to keep abreast of voyage specifics and emerging demurrage issues work closely with traders shipping operators contracts team and ship charterers by offering advice and assistance to optimize efficiency and demurrage prevention. education and experience qualification in engineering finance or business or supply chain management or law related discipline commercial experience in the oil industry and or petroleum trading companies in areas such as supply planning operations or bulk shipping preferred. essential skills amp competencies understanding of the national and international shipping requirements and restrictions negotiation skills ability to interpret contracts commercial awareness attention to details time management and organizational skills pro_active and able to work with minimal supervision pc literate microsoft word excel powerpoint outlook russian and english fluent. advantages office work in an international company competitive salary depends on experience and qualification comfortable working environment in the city center with international professional team medical and travel insurance mobile phone allowances opportunity for personal and professional growth.

знания соответствуют требованиям вакансии почему именно должны пригласить собеседование желаемый уровень заработной платы бонуса. миссия роли обеспечить высокий уровень первичных контактов квалификаций подготовку качественных возможностей развития бизнеса формируя устойчивый поток amp a_сделок целевых сегментах совместно старшими коллегами. эта роль сочетает элементы стратегического бизнес_девелопмента интеллектуального развития навыков области продаж развитию отношений финансовой аналитики высоком ом уровне коммуникаций собственниками бизнеса. предстоит заниматься 1. origination amp outbound определение релевантного круга компаний целевых отраслях совместно head of origination execution team формирование профессиональных персонализированных касаний linkedin email telegram телефону. управление структурированными outreach_последовательностями подбор комбинаций связок развитие базы собственников предприятий бизнесов c_level. 2. первичная квалификация аналитическая оценка проведение первичных встреч консультаций собственниками гендиректорами совместно head of origination оценка мотивации текущей ситуации бизнеса перспектив сделки. сбор финансовых параметров выручка ebitda активы подготовка кратких аналитических профилей компаний. структурирование информации. 3. системная работа head of origination передача квалифицированных лидов. совместное участие планировании оптимизации воронки сделок. подготовка аналитических сводок сегментам отраслям компаниям совместно execution team 4. crm amp data management ведение amocrm высокой точностью данных. поддержание актуальности контактной базы. формирование системных отчётов контроль качества информации требования опыт года b2b_продажах консалтинге инвестиционном подразделении корпоративном развитии. доказанный опыт коммуникаций лпр обязательно опыт работы банке сегменте wealth management b2c продажах премиальных услуг товаров преимуществом. навыки сильная письменная устная деловая коммуникация. умение вести содержательный диалог собственниками бизнеса. понимание базовых финансовых показателей. владение инструментами linkedin профпереписки crm. способность быстро анализировать компании формировать выводы. личные качества интеллектуальная дисциплина аналитичность. системность мышления структурность. умение работать высоких стандартах сопровождения сделок. развитая культурная профессиональная коммуникация. мотивация развиваться amp корпоративных финансах deal_making. условия удаленная гибридная работа полный рабочий день. компенсация достойный фиксированный оклад бонус месячный квартальный выполнение kpi годовой бонус результата работы команды.
